vehicles.description: A dark-colored car is driving in the same direction as our vehicle on the road to the right side, maintaining a moderate distance ahead.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle has determined the following distance and speed adjustments that must be considered to maintain a safe following distance and to be prepared for any potential speed changes or lane changes by the vehicle ahead.

barriers.description: White protective fences are installed on both sides of the road, creating a physical barrier between the pedestrian walkways and the vehicle lanes, with a median strip also in place to separate the traffic moving in opposite directions.
barriers.explanation: These barriers guide vehicles to choose the appropriate lane position and alert drivers that the road space is narrower, which may affect lane discipline and speed selection.

other objects.description: Numerous structures related to architecture and a guardhouse right next to an obstacle on the right side.
other objects.explanation: These objects indicate that construction activities are underway. Drivers should be prepared at all times to respond to construction vehicles or workers that may enter the road.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic image shows a dark-colored car driving in the same direction as our vehicle on the road to the right side, maintaining a moderate distance ahead. This vehicle necessitates adjustments in following distance and speed to maintain safety and respond to any potential changes in its speed or lane. Additionally, white protective fences are installed on both sides of the road, creating a physical barrier between the pedestrian walkways and the vehicle lanes, with a median strip separating the traffic moving in opposite directions. These barriers guide vehicles to the appropriate lane positions and alert drivers to the narrow road space, influencing lane discipline and speed. Furthermore, there are numerous architectural structures and a guardhouse next to an obstacle on the right side, indicating ongoing construction activities. Drivers should be prepared to respond to construction vehicles or workers that may enter the road.

driving_suggestion: Given there are no immediate road users or obstacles requiring urgent attention, the vehicle should continue along the current flow of traffic while monitoring the distance to the vehicle ahead and any potential changes in traffic lights. Drive at a safe speed, and remain cautious of possible obstacles and construction activities ahead. Maintain a safe distance from the vehicle in front, and adhere to any additional instructions on traffic signs near pedestrian crossings. The vehicle should also keep lane discipline, be aware of vehicles merging from controlled access areas, and be prepared to adjust speed or stop at an upcoming intersection if necessary.

1.description and explanation: This object is a traffic sign with a blue background and white symbols or text on it, typically used to provide information to road users. The presence and content of the sign influence the ego car's driving behavior by conveying important information about upcoming road conditions, regulations, or directions. The ego car's driver must observe and understand the sign to make appropriate driving decisions.

2.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, commonly used as a temporary traffic control device to warn drivers of potential hazards or to divert traffic. It is orange and white, offering high visibility. The cone would signal the ego car to stay clear of a specific area or to merge into another lane, depending on the placement of multiple cones and the existing road situation.
